last_action: click on the "Theme" located at upper middle and left.
reflect_result: By clicking on the "Theme" option, you have accessed the theme settings, where you can choose different color schemes for the keyboard. The current screen displays various color options, including a default theme and several other colors for customization. This action has made progress towards the user request of changing the keyboard's appearance, as it allows you to select a new color for the theme, which directly impacts the look of the keyboard.
